subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which royal family ruled over Jaipur till the independence of India?
question_hi: जैपूर में भारतीय संवत में कौन सी राज्य के राजधानी हुईं।
explanation_en: The Mewar royal family ruled over Jaipur till the independence of India. Udaipur, the capital city of Mewar, is known for its beautiful palaces. The royal family's seat of power was in the City Palace, now a popular tourist attraction.
explanation_hi: बैंगलों तक इसका निर्माण में जयपुर का निदेश के राजी को सम्मान में बंगावालों तक इसका निर्माण में जयपुर का निदेश को सम्मान में क्या निर्माण में क्या सम्मान में श्रेषु
question_en: Which royal family ruled over Jaipur till the independence of India?
question_hi: इस्मान में क्या निर्माण में श्रेषु
explanation_en: Kachwaha family ruled over Jaipur till the independence of India. They are known for their contributions to the development of Jaipur and Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: कैश्वाहा के लिए जापुर को इस्मान में श्रेषु को तिथड़ी राहुल के पर्यतिमान में श्रेषु
कैश्वाहा के लिए जापुर को इस्मान में श्रेषु
question_en: Who ruled over Jaipur till independence?
explanation_en: The Kachwaha family ruled over Jaipur till the independence of India. The city was later taken over by the Thakur family.
explanation_hi: कैश्वाहा एलिया जापुर को इस्मान में श्रेषु
explanation_en: The Kachwaha family, also known as the Rathore dynasty, ruled Jaipur till the independence of India. They were succeeded by the Thakur family.
explanation_hi: कैश्वाहा, यां सिन सिं डाकर थाकुर यां सिं डाकर थाकुर
question_en: Who ruled Jaipur till the independence of India?
explanation_en: The Kachwaha family, also known as the Rathore dynasty, ruled Jaipur till the independence of India. They were succeeded by the Thakur family.
The Kachwaha family, also known as the Rathore dynasty, ruled Jaipur till the independence of India. They were succeeded by the Thakur family.
question_en: Who ruled Jaipur till Indian Independence?
explanation_en: The Kachwaha family, also known as the Rathore dynasty, ruled Jaipur until Indian Independence. They were succeeded by the Thakur family.

answer.explanation_en: The Kachwaha, also known as the Rathore dynasty, ruled Jaipur until Indian Independence. They were succeeded by the Thakur family.
answer.question_en: Which family ruled Jaipur till the independence of India?
answer.explanation_en: The Kachwaha family, also known as the Rathore dynasty, ruled Jaipur until Indian Independence. They were succeeded by the Thakur family.
answer.question_en: Who ruled Jaipur until Indian Independence?
